name: Great Naval Battles, Vol. 1: North Atlantic 1939-1943
name_original: Great Naval Battles, Vol. 1: North Atlantic 1939-1943
description:
Great Naval Battles, Vol. 1: North Atlantic 1939-1943 is a strategy-simulation game developed by 10 Design Group.
Great Naval Battles, Vol. 1: North Atlantic 1939-1943 is available on PC.
